listing.listing_description:
Perched on the hillside of Thalang, Villa Dara enjoys views of the lush jungle, stretching all the way to the Andaman Sea. With seven luxurious bedrooms, spacious interiors, and a vast terrace, Dara is the perfect host for a family vacation, golf trip with friends, or a refreshing retreat. Nearby, you’ll find one of Phuket’s best-kept secrets, Layan Beach. A favorite among locals, Layan has managed to stay fairly inconspicuous on the tourist scene, despite its beautiful white sand, calm and clear waters, and a beachfront restaurant.

The ability to fully enjoy the incredible scenery and natural elements of Phuket was of utmost importance to Dara’s architect, as you will see when exploring the open-air estate. Fresh breeze and natural sunlight have every opportunity to fill the open concept common areas thanks to the many wide openings to the terrace. Inside, sleek and stylish modern design shows off Dara’s luxurious side. Designer furniture, high-end electronics, and contemporary works of art provide the decor. In the kitchen, state of the art appliances will inspire your inner chef. And, there’s a barbecue on the terrace as well.

Outside, Dara’s swimming pool is the perfect place to relax while you enjoy a sunny afternoon. After a dip, work on your tan from one of the sun loungers or sunbeds placed throughout the spacious terrace. At dinner, you’ll have the choice between the formal dining area inside or the alfresco set on the terrace. And after, enjoy a night under the stars, sipping your favorite cocktail with friends and loved ones on the terrace’s furnished lounge area.

When it’s time to get out and explore Phuket, a great place to start is Bangla Road in Patong Beach. Just under half an hour from home, Bangla Road is Phuket’s nightlife capital. There, you’ll find a wide range of bars, restaurants, and nightclubs. If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Course and Blue Canyon Country Club are within a short drive. And, for shopping and dining a little closer to home, Boat Avenue Mall will have everything you need.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located just a 2 minute walk from Kamala Beach, this villa offered the best of modern comforts while being infused with a distinct sense of Thai heritage and craftsmanship. With a gorgeous pool, easy access to the delights of Kamala town, and countless activities nearby, guests can plan their day in shade and comfort while watching surfers on the blue Andaman waves that sweep into the bay below. 

A rense of regal style runs through this property, with nods to the grandiose, royal history of Thailand being visible throughout. Guests will love starting the day under the ornate, “temple-style” gazebo that sits in the flower-filled garden. Constructed out of polished stone and stained wood, it comes complete with a beautiful round table for socializing and enjoying alfresco meals. For pure refreshment, dive  into the pool stretches the length of the villa, reflecting the brilliant Phuket sky above. The spacious interior makes great use of fine wood craftsmanship, with beautiful fixtures and welcoming furniture flanked by stone statues and obsidian carvings from the Thai tradition. Guests will find everything has a little extra in this villa, from the huge spaces of the master bedroom, to the fully-equipped games room, to the bay view offered from the couple’s hot tub.

As guests take in the wild hillsides that rise above Surin Hill on the other side of the bay, they can contemplate outings that range from an engaging few hours, to a whole day of adventure. Take to the sea for an unparalleled scuba diving cruise to the coral reefs just beyond Kamala beach, or head into the town itself to sample street food and the town’s famed theme park. Alternatively, head into the island’s interior, to visit hidden waterfalls, the touching encounters that can be had in nearby elephant, tiger and gibbon sanctuaries, as well as the experience-for-the-senses that is the bustling city of Phuket itself. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Anayara Beach Villa is located on the sandy shores of Ao Yon Beach in Phuket. With five luxurious king-sized ocean-view bedrooms, you won't have anyone fighting over "the good room." In fact, Anayara's designers made sure that every room in the villa has an incredible ocean view. And, with instant beachfront access, you'll have the freedom to enjoy the ocean on your schedule, no planning, no travel, no hassle.

Traditional Thai architecture gets a stylish modern update in this breezy beach house. From head to toe, Anayara is an authentic representation of Thailand's beautiful natural features. Rich wood trim and flooring combine with calming white interiors and sleek designer furniture to create an ambiance that is both soothing and elegant. Every room on the open-concept main floor has access to the terrace, as do the two main floor bedrooms. Upstairs, the three other bedrooms have private balconies, opening Anayara's entire interior space to Phuket's gorgeous climate.

Anayara's beachfront terrace practically doubles as a second villa with its outdoor kitchen and grill, furnished lounge areas, and alfresco dining. There are also some great lounge chairs and sun beds positioned around the pool, perfect for working on your vacation tan. Back inside, you'll have everything you need at mealtime, including a chef. There's formal dining for ten, a gorgeous lounge area, a spa, and air conditioning for you and your guests to enjoy. And, there's television and Wi-Fi to help you stay connected, if you want to.

There is lots to do nearby Anayara's beachfront estate, and it's all within fifteen-kilometers. Start with a trip to Phuket's downtown where you'll find shopping, dining, and vibrant nightlife. To learn a little about the native wildlife and culture, spend an afternoon at the Phuket Aquarium, Phuket Zoo, and visit Wat Chalong Temple to see the true beauty of ancient Thai architecture. And, a variety of activities, excursions, babysitting, cooking classes, and spa services can be arranged through Anayara's villa manager.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hold your next large-scale event on the beachfront at this multi-villa estate in Koh Samui. Embrace the help of a full-staff during your destination wedding, corporate retreat, or family reunion. Mingle with friends at the poolside wet bar while the kids run around the playground. Then, drive 8-kilometers to Nathon for some souvenir shopping and a seafood dinner.

Split into 3 separate villas; the Chai Talay Estate offers accommodations for 28 guests. There’s formal and alfresco dining for even more. And, each villa has its own set of full amenities. The tropical setting is put on display thanks to the open-air layout. Follow the pathways that connect each area, and you’ll surely find the perfect place to read in the shade, work on your tan, or dig your feet into the sand. The estate comes with a vast selection of sporting facilities, watersport equipment, and 2 swimming pools. After a long day, settle in for a movie night in front of the outdoor cinema screen or book yourself a massage.

Hop on one of the provided bicycles and keep up with your fitness schedule while you explore the estate. If you’d rather travel by sea, there’s a kayak waiting for you on the beach. For a different beach setting, check out the club at Nikki Beach, it’s an excellent spot for dinner and cocktails at sunset. If you’re interested in the local culture, visit the Big Buddha Temple and Old Fisherman’s Village, both are less than a half-hour from home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Nirvana is a magnificent luxury home on Cape Panwa in southwest Phuket, with direct access to Panwa Beach. Protected by private roads, this beach is one of the island's most serene and enchanting, with bay-sheltered waters open year-round for swimmers (unlike many of the beaches on Phuket's west coast). The villa is part of a small enclave of high-end residences with a shared, beachfront swimming pool. Perched on elevated ground, the two-story home enjoys breathtaking, panoramic views of the Andaman Sea. Generous outdoor spaces (including a six-person hot tub) and superbly appointed interiors create an ideal haven for families and groups of friends up to eight in size.

The villa's ample upper balcony inspires long days and evenings in the sea-kissed air. Bask in the sunlight on elegant lounge chairs before descending to the pool or sea. Return to alfresco meals at the table for eight, and sunset cocktails in the comfortable lounge. Crawl into the hot tub for a soothing soak in the dreamy nighttime breeze.

Wide glass doors fuse the balcony with the open-concept interior, creating an expansive, indoor/outdoor venue. The luminous interior features a classy bar, a cozy TV lounge, and a second beautiful dining table. The semi-open kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and easily serves the various living and dining areas. White surfaces and natural wood accents complement the exquisite art collection, blending contemporary and traditional Thai influences.

The villa features three king bedrooms and one kid-friendly room with twin-size Murphy beds. Each room has safe and 3D TV. The master suite includes a lovely piano, wine fridge, and ensuite bathroom with jetted tub. The primary guest suite also enjoys a wine fridge and ensuite bathroom. The other two rooms share a Balinese-style bathroom with alfresco shower. The villa is fully air-conditioned and includes plentiful ceiling fans.

Panwa Beach offers a peaceful alternative to Phuket's more popular tourist destinations, with minimal visitors, perfect swimming conditions, and a wonderful selection of restaurants, wellness centers, and watersport offerings in the vicinity. The villa is also within walking distance of Ao Yon Beach, and less than a kilometer from Tarzan Adventure Phuket. Phuket Town is just nine kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to one of Phuket’s best—but lesser known—white-sand beaches at Villa Baan Amandeha. This exclusive beachfront vacation rental is right on the shores of picturesque Ao Yon Bay, and offers easy access to the activities on the island’s quieter south coast as well as the bustle of Phuket town. Reserve its sleek contemporary interiors and ten bedrooms to host a family reunion, celebrate a special occasion with friends or even to exchange vows in a destination wedding.

The villa is tucked into beautiful private gardens featuring palm trees, flowering tropical plants and a 200-year-old tamarind tree. Enjoy the sunshine, sea breezes and beach views from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, barbecue, wet bar, plenty of loungers and a honeymoon-style two-person hot tub. When you’re inside, you can enjoy the home theater system, spa and steam rooms, and ping-pong and pool tables.

One of Thailand’s top architects laid out this luxury property as two buildings connected by a sky bridge, taking full advantage of the light and location. The main living area has an open-plan living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen spread out over more than 2,000 square feet of space, all with clean-lined modern furniture.

The villa has nine bedrooms with two twin beds each, which can be arranged as one king bed, and one bedroom with two king beds. All ten bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and can accommodate up to twenty guests on holiday together. Many of the suites also have sea views or open to a furnished balcony.

Not only is Ao Yon Beach a postcard-perfect crescent of sand and brilliant blue water, it’s one of the few beaches on Phuket to offer swimming nearly every day of the year. If you’d like to compare it to others, it’s a short drive to some of the island’s most popular beaches, such as Patong and Surin. For shopping and dining, make the quick trip into Phuket town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Take yourself away to one of the most exclusive areas of Phuket at Villa Baan Amandhara. Set on Cape Panwa, the gateway to islands such as Phi Phi and Koh Racha, this beachfront vacation rental also is right on the white sands of Ao Yon Bay. Added to its contemporary living areas and six bedrooms, the location makes this luxury property perfect for a relaxed holiday with family or friends.

Enjoy your own private views of the Andaman Sea from a gorgeous waterfront terrace with an infinity pool, plenty of loungers and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue. Inside, the villa features an exercise room, ping-pong and pool tables, plus a TV, DVD player, sound system and Wi-Fi for your entertainment.

From its built-in outdoor seating to its glass walls and open-concept layout, this newly built residence is sleek and contemporary. Open the sliding doors to the terrace to connect the al-fresco living areas with the indoor living area, dining table and fully equipped kitchen. Even with the doors closed, the glass walls bring the sea views inside.

Each of the villa’s six bedrooms is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and a furnished outdoor space, whether a terrace or balcony. The suites also have TVs, mini-fridges, air conditioning and ceiling fans, as well as the same clean-lined modern style as the great room.

Pretty and sheltered, Ao Yon Beach is one of the few on Phuket to offer nearly year-round swimming—and it’s just in front of Villa Baan Amandhara. If you’d like to compare it to some of the island’s better-known beaches, it’s just a short drive to Patong Beach and Surin Beach. If you’re traveling with kids, try a visit to the nearby Phuket Aquarium or Phuket Zoo. To browse for souvenirs or try out local restaurants, drive into Phuket town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located just off the southern edge of Kamala Beach, this luxurious open-air villa has an unbeatable ocean view from all five bedrooms, and it’s living areas. Nearby, you’ll have quick access to the beach, shopping, amusement parks, nightlife, golf, and restaurants. Although there’s plenty of amazing cuisine in the area, you might find it hard to tear yourself away from Andara’s beautiful estate, complete with a private Thai chef. With spacious common areas, five ocean-view king en-suite bedrooms, and plenty to keep you busy within a short drive, Andara is perfect for a family vacation, golf trip with friends, and any other occasion worth celebrating in style.

Andara's modern exterior embraces Thailand’s lush tropical greenery by displaying its mature palm trees, bright flowers, and wild vines that hang from the balcony over the ocean-view terrace. The open concept living room’s perimeter is made up of floor-to-ceiling glass, framing garden and ocean view from all angles. Open the wide doors to the terrace, and the interior floods with fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight.

From its ocean-view balcony, infinity pool, and lavish interior you’ll enjoy an ever-present vista of the Andaman Sea during your stay at Andara. At dinner, there’s alfresco dining under the pavilion on the terrace and a formal dining area inside. Other interior features include Wi-Fi, satellite television, air conditioning, exercise equipment, and a pool table.

After you’ve explored the sandy shores and calm waters of Kamala Beach, the numerous inland golf courses, and the seaside district of Kathu, head into Phuket town for an exciting and eclectic mix of attractions. For nightlife, shopping, and dinner, Old Town is the place to be, especially on Sundays when Thalang Road is closed to traffic and turns into an open-air market. If you’re in the mood for something a little off the wall, visit Phuket’s Upside Down House or the Trickeye Museum, both are extremely artistic and interesting for the whole family.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Natha is a chic and contemporary, private hillside villa located close to Koh Samui’s most popular shopping, dining and entertainment enclave along Chaweng Beach. This private vacation rental offers guests breathtaking 180 degree views of the tropical coastline and oceanfront of the crystalline Gulf of Siam. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!

The architecture of Villa Natha provides a seamless flow of indoor/outdoor living, with wide terraces for lounging in tranquil comfort and an impressive 50 foot, L-shaped infinity swimming pool. The villa’s comfortable upper lounge is furnished with an inviting oversized double sofa suite, while the airy dining space easily seats ten guests at a long, polished wooden dining table. The dining room also features a breakfast bar and stools, and both areas are directly served by the villa’s fitted western-style kitchen. A second kitchen is primarily use by the chef and staff to prepare more elaborate meals for guests.

Inside, you will find a combination of crisp white walls, smooth marble tiled floors and warm wooden tones. The sophisticated interior design blends natural textures and gentle Asian touches. The villa’s capacious open plan design includes living and dining spaces, both of which fold onto the furnished poolside terrace. The dining room extends onto a separate terrace with a built-in barbeque. A second living area and media room is situated on the middle floor of the property, furnished with a long sofa facing a large flat screen television. Sliding doors at one end of the room open to a study.

The villa’s five luxurious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are spread over three floors. All of them offer sensational sea views right from the bed. Televisions and built-in wardrobes add to the feeling of a five-star resort, while the huge en-suite bathrooms in the two master suites provide twin wash basins and both indoor or outdoor showers.

Additional facilities for guests at Villa Natha include a fully equipped private gym, as well as a fabulous home cinema with comfortable seating, a large projector screen and surround sound. The property includes 24-hour security service and parking spaces. You will also be within minutes of the boutiques and fine dining in Chaweng and the magnificent holes at the Santiburi Golf Course, a regular stop on the PGA tour. Come with the family on holiday, or host a wedding reception!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
